title: Tim Reviews Final Fantasy 7 Crisis Core & Elden Ring Drops DLC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.06.22
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get 50% off two or more pairs.

Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unnecessary subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Tim and Mike talk Crisis Core Final Fantasy VII Reunion, Elden Ring finally getting some DLC, and a Toejam and Earl movie.
